author: Kellen Beck
title: The best YouTube videos to watch if you want to make your own face mask
description: Now that the CDC is recommending we all wear cloth face masks in public, you may be wondering how exactly you can use what you have on hand to get out on public and keep others safe. As the coronavirus pandemic continues, people are uploading helpful videos o…
